name: 威廉·肖克利
bio_short: 美国物理学家和发明家。他领导了贝尔实验室的晶体管研发团队，并独立发明了更先进的“结型晶体管”。他因晶体管的发明（`transistor_invention_1947`）获得1956年诺贝尔奖，并被誉为“硅谷之父”。
bio_short_en: An American physicist and inventor. He led the Bell Labs transistor team and independently invented the superior 'junction transistor'. He shared the 1956 Nobel Prize for the invention of the transistor (`transistor_invention_1947`) and is known as the 'Father of Silicon Valley'.
